description:
I show you seven different two-player starter sets for wargaming that I own - under $100.

Steel Rift Quick Build 2-Player Box Set: https://deathraydesigns.com/product/quick-build-2-player-starter-box
Halo Flashpoint Recon Edition: https://haloflashpoint.manticgames.com/products/recon-edition
Battletech Alpha Strike Box Set: https://store.catalystgamelabs.com/products/battletech-alpha-strike-box-set
This Quar's War: Clash of Rhyfles: https://wargamesatlantic.com/products/this-quars-war-clash-of-rhyfles
Relicblade - Storms of Kural: https://www.relicblade.com/shop/p/storms-of-kural
I Am the Law - Judge Dredd Starter Box: https://us.warlordgames.com/products/judge-dredd-starter-game
Fallout Factions: https://www.falloutfactions.com

Vince Venturella and I made another game! Check out Deth Wizards at http://www.dethwizardsgame.com

I'm now a partner on Twitch! I paint minis every Friday morning and Monday night, and sometimes take paint breaks (play video games poorly). Follow me: http:/
title: I Look at Seven 2-Player Wargaming Starter Sets UNDER $100
